definition[0]: to not include someone or something in an activity
example[0]: I’m sorry, you’ll have to count me out tonight.
definition[1]: to decide that someone or something is not important or worth considering
example[1]: I wouldn’t count him out. If anybody can make a comeback, he can.
definition[2]: to put things down one by one as you count them
example[2]: The teller counted out ten $50 bills.
